title: Question about pictures.
body:
Hey there. Is there any way of posting images from the gallary of the Laptop/tablet usw.?
Or Do i have to upload it somewhere and post the Link? Im new here so dont Blade me :C
Would apreciate help. Thanks.

replies.body:
You have to upload it somewhere (an image hosting site) and link it here.

There used to be an upload option here but some people were abusing it so they had to remove it to prevent further abuse

Welcome to the boards!  There currently is not an Attachment feature.  You can use sites like Imgur to upload an image, and paste the link into your post for it to appear.  There is also a wonderful guide on[ boards formatting](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101)  that might help make you an expert in no time!  Please let me know if you have any questions!
